title: The Vatican just got its own version of Pokemon GO – Follow Jesus Christ GO | Trusted Reviews
description: ![Follow Jesus ChristGO]()### Google’s 2018 Halloween Doodle is an addictive multiplayer game – here’show to play](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/google-halloween-doodle-2018-game-play-3613241 "Google’s 2018 Halloween Doodle is an addictive multiplayer game– here’s how to play")  * There’s only a Spanish version of Follow JC Go right now, given that its thenative language of Pope Francis, although we’d be keen to see an Englishrelease.Despite its obvious inspiration, this could be a great way of educating youngplayers on religious history, if that’s the kind of thing you’re into.**What do you think of Follow Jesus Christ GO? Let us know on Facebook andTwitter @trustedreviews.**
